DataSource.Item: SELECT [Province_Code] ,[Province_Name] FROM [Location_in_Thailand].[dbo].[Province] WHERE [Province_Code] like '%@SearchText%' OR [Province_Name] like '%@SearchText%'

SELECT [Area_Code] ,[Area_Name] FROM [Location_in_Thailand].[dbo].[Area] WHERE Province_Code = '@Parameter' AND substring([Area_Code],LEN([Area_Code]),1) != '0' AND ([Area_Name] like '%@SearchText%' OR [Area_Code] like '%@SearchText%')
